component.name: Shadok and Gibby
component.summary: 2D turn-based strategy game with puzzle elements

description.p: In "Shadok and Gibby", you play as Shadok in a field filled with flowers and Gibbies. Your goal is to collect flowers, each offering points based on their brightness. The challenge lies in gathering enough points within 100 moves while avoiding the Gibbies, who aim to hinder your progress. As flowers are consumed, new ones sprout randomly across the field, offering a fresh opportunity to score but also increasing the strategic complexity.
